outline.title: Sovereign System — Evidence-First AI Governance
outline.summary: Title slide introducing the framework, author, and steward.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/EYASyvkvv5H5.png - Image 1 visually represents AI governance, which is the core topic of the title slide.

outline.title: The Problem We Solve
outline.summary: AI systems cannot prove their own safety under adversarial challenge.

outline.title: Our Solution in One Sentence
outline.summary: Governance is a safety system, not a reporting layer.

outline.title: What is the Codex of Record?
outline.summary: A meta-framework for evidence-first governance.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/wZjxXNJBf6Bc.png; /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/d0omuyZLle6N.jpg - Images 2 and 3 both depict AI governance frameworks and processes, aligning with the concept of a meta-framework for evidence-first governance.

outline.title: The Prime Governance Paradox
outline.summary: A system must prove it cannot escape its own governance.

outline.title: Three Roles — Separation of Concern
outline.summary: Builder, Adversary, and Witness roles must remain separate.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/uMMjbh3gkMi2.jpg; /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/4C0oNOX01bC4.webp - Images 7 and 8 both show corporate governance structures with distinct roles, which aligns with the 'Three Roles - Separation of Concern' slide.

outline.title: Six Execution Phases
outline.summary: Industry-grade safety review phases from Declaration to ALARP.

outline.title: Loop Closure — The System Must Terminate
outline.summary: Iterate until stable or contradiction is reached.

outline.title: Evidence Standard — No Exceptions
outline.summary: All outputs must be append-only, hash-sealed, and reproducible.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/T7Dt7XJTMKE6.png; /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/jEaVkDjrYJAL.jpg - Images 15 and 16 both illustrate audit trails and blockchain concepts, which align with the 'append-only, hash-sealed, timestamped' evidence standard.

outline.title: The Final Witness Oath
outline.summary: The review must be reconstructable without the author.

outline.title: Not a Novel Invention — A Synthesis
outline.summary: The Codex unifies 11 proven professional frameworks.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/9pi6ZhxQym5z.webp; /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/KJqoYyzX6QXh.jpg - Images 4 and 5 both depict enterprise architecture blueprints, which can represent the synthesis of multiple frameworks.

outline.title: PRINCE2 Alignment
outline.summary: Mapping stage gates, roles, and continued justification.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/4wrr7Ll64etB.jpg - Image 6 shows a ServiceNow ESM Architecture Blueprint, which can represent a structured project management framework like PRINCE2.

outline.title: NEBOSH & ALARP Alignment
outline.summary: Safety engineering discipline applied to AI governance.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/Zfiz3PGHi8I3.jpg; /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/9c5NwcBlSD5o.jpg; /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/Z9fNmwDt8C5P.png - Images 9, 10, and 11 all relate to safety management systems and processes, aligning with NEBOSH and ALARP alignment.

outline.title: Quality Management Alignment (PPAP/APQP)
outline.summary: Production Part Approval Process for AI systems.

outline.title: Legal & Ethical Alignment
outline.summary: Professional conduct standards for AI operators.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/VSpCeUBMDwAx.png; /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/Ne7XhkZVOYzV.jpeg; /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/sKETCkirsUZb.png - Images 12, 13, and 14 all depict compliance and governance frameworks, aligning with legal and ethical standards.

outline.title: Political Forces Driving Adoption
outline.summary: Regulatory pressure is accelerating globally.

outline.title: Economic Forces
outline.summary: Governance-grade AI is a market requirement.

outline.title: Social & Technological Forces
outline.summary: Public trust is conditional on demonstrable safety.

outline.title: Legal & Environmental Forces
outline.summary: Litigation and sustainability are converging on AI.

outline.title: Scenario-Based, Falsifiable, Assumption-Explicit
outline.summary: Structured foresight, not futurism.

outline.title: Baseline Scenario (2026-2051)
outline.summary: Steady regulatory convergence and governance adoption.

outline.title: Accelerated Adoption Scenario
outline.summary: Major incident triggers rapid global mandates.

outline.title: Fragmented Regulation Scenario
outline.summary: Jurisdictional divergence creates complexity.

outline.title: From Founder Narrative to Auditable Valuation
outline.summary: Valuation grounded in concrete deliverables.

outline.title: What We Built vs What Competitors Optimize
outline.summary: We optimized constraint and proof, not noise.

outline.title: Competitive Differentiation
outline.summary: Evidence-first governance is a defensible moat.

outline.title: Target Markets
outline.summary: Regulated industries with high liability exposure.

outline.title: Revenue Model
outline.summary: Licensing, certification, consulting, and training.

outline.title: The Blade of Truth — 13-Layer Implementation
outline.summary: From intent contract to done-done release gate.

outline.title: Canonical Layout — No Overlap
outline.summary: Physical separation of concerns enforced.

outline.title: Cryptographic Attestation
outline.summary: Hash-sealed, timestamped, append-only evidence chain.

outline.title: Trinity Loop Protocol
outline.summary: Continuous adversarial review, not one-time audit.

outline.title: The System Signals Done
outline.summary: Structural, epistemic, and narrative indicators of completion.

outline.title: Next Steps — Publication Mode
outline.summary: The build phase is closed; communication begins.

outline.title: Final Statement
outline.summary: We tried to be right, and the evidence will endure.
